lines.text: What are you guys doing tonight?
Nothing much.
Kappa Omega party.
Oh, you mean the homo house?
Well one will crack jokes about others when they are insecure with their own masculinity.
Oh, I hate guys like that. They're so immature.

[Steve drives up]
Hey beautiful! Want a ride?
No thanks, Steve. I'll walk.

[sarcastically]
Real mature.
[Toni has arranged for Debbie to meet her Secret Admirer]

[wearing a teddy, posing in the mirror]
What should I wear?
Something demure.
Oh, yeah. Christian Demure. I've got tons of her stuff.

[Michael has finished composing his letter to Deborah, he reads it before sealing it, impressed with his work]
Jesus.

[steaming Michael's letter open and reading it, in disgust]
JESUS!

[reading "Michael's" letter by Toni, dreamily]
Jesus...

[to Steve as he turns to leave]
One more thing, lover boy...

[rolls eyes in embarrassment]
Oh, God.

[pats his pistol]
Get her pregnant, I'll blow your dick off.

[as Lou leaves]
DADDY!
Good evening Mr. Fimple
Fuck you!
Michael... I think you just won the Asshole of the Year Award.
[slams door in Michael's face]

[shouting through drive-through speaker]
Did you tell your friends I boffed your brains out in your van?
Jesus! You are one gutsy virgin!
